title: dAriya tOre
sahitya:
dAriya tOre pAlene kAyo bEgane bArO ghana sEvyage yOgyare elliyu sari kANalariyadavare


anupallavi

  sEride nimmane hADuve kIrtane Aliso enna A turate nIrina mElina guLLiya jIvita sArthaka mADiso gururAyA


caraNam 1    pUjeya mADi pAlane bayasuva dAsana Aluve gururAyA tALada kAdara tIriso mantra Alaya nilaya gururAyA
    caraNam 2    hAvaLi muccisi bEDida poraisi Adariso enna gururAyA Ashrayavittu pAliso parama pAvana sundara gururAyA
